title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: E.L.", 1930–45
medium: Pen and black and red ink; brush and black ink, red watercolor; graphite on cream illustration board.
inscribed: In graphite at lower right corner: "E.L."; at upper right corner:"352"
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Circular monogram comprised of an "E" formed by a thick black circle with a short central branch superimposed with a red "L" in the upper right quadrant of the circle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: E.L.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Pen and black and red ink; brush and black ink, red watercolor; graphite on cream illustration board.. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-92.
